darkdemon921, this one is for you. You asked how to download and burn games without a flaw or interruption.  First you download utorrent from www.utorrent.com, then after that is done... go to torrentz.org. Search any kind of game/movie you want. XBOX360/PS3/WII/ etc. After you find a torrent you are happy with, click it. It will give you a list of torrent sites to download from. Click one that is not sponsored. After that, click download torrent. A box will come up. click open. After that, another box will come up, just press OK. It will immediately open your utorrent. Might take awile but who cares lol ITS FREE.
Burning the game is vary simple, you can do that frow the utorrent you downloaded before. Feel free to ask me anything about downloading/burning games. I have been doing it for years.
